name: Spiky Scramble (5/10)
description: In this game you play as an egg that's trying to move across a field to get to an apple.  In order to do that, though, you need to move around spikes.  If you touch the spikes, the level will restart.   When you get to the square, that the apple's in, the walls will disappear when interacted with.  When the egg runs into the apple, the next level will start.
